<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Location and data center sites details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/insights/v3.0/resource/query/locations/noc_location_list_rn_sc"}></MethodEndpoint>



Provides details on Prisma Access locations of branch and data center sites.


## Request
